jld.title: Get more out of your free Justia Lawyer Directory profile by making it more complete!
jld.description: Including a list of practice areas, short bio, high quality photo, publications, awards, and a link to your website or blog will help you connect with clients and generate more leads. Adding your office location will help you appear in local lawyer directory searches, and listing an updated email address will make it easier for clients to get in touch today!
